name: comete_moelle
author: EMPENN
description: Spinal cord lesion segmentation from T2 and STIR images.
command-line: T2DIR=$PWD/T2_input; STIRDIR=$PWD/STIR_input; OUTDIR=$PWD/output_folder; unzip [INPUT_T2] -d $T2DIR; unzip [INPUT_STIR] -d $STIRDIR; rm $T2DIR/*.json $STIRDIR/*.json; mkdir $OUTDIR; (cd /app_primus && python3 /app_primus/inference_multimodal.py -t $T2DIR -s $STIRDIR -o $OUTDIR) && cp input_param_file.json $OUTDIR/input_params.json && tar -cvzf [OUTPUT_FILE] $OUTDIR && rm -rf $OUTDIR && chmod -R 777 *
